card_text: Apply these effects in sequence, based on the number of banished Fish monsters.$N●1+: Your Fish monsters cannot be destroyed by battle this turn.$N●4+: The activation and effects of Fish monster effects activated on your field cannot be negated this turn.$N●8+: Special Summon 1 Fish Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)$NYou can only activate 1 "Ghoti Cosmos" per turn.
